content: "What?" asked Al-Sayib. "You think that being on international TV means that you need to strut around in an Armani now?"
translations: ita:Come, disse Al-Sayib. Pensi che andare su una televisione internazionale significhi aver bisogno di pavoneggiarsi con un
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by FeuDRenais (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
